name: telepathy
effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
short_effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
